sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 En, 56 R Atk, 200 R Def, 24 Sp
sets.detail:
200 HP with 200 Ranged Defense maximizes ranged bulk 
 20 Energy with Heavy Shield allows for 1 Rejuvenate, 1 Tase and 2 Flash 'n Flee / Thunderstrike's 
 24 Speed creeps Sluggish Ursoul 
 Rest thrown into Ranged attack
